60887.17 46330.44 63215.87 63215.87 54903.69 65993.27 56566.86 47431.67 60 CHAPTER – 9(a) Total Budget of the Ministry of Agriculture for 2020-21 was 142970.42 crores (Revenue and Capital). Against this budget actual expenditure was 116308.03 Crores ( 116286.23 Crores on Revenue side and 21.80 Crores on Capital side). Trend of Expenditure during Last Five Years ( in Crores) 2016-17 2017-18 2018-19 2019-202 2020-212 Total Budget Estimates 55452.49 62445.25 79455.04 138564.09 142970.42 Actual Expenditure (Revenue Section) 48919.65 55920.31 58088.89 102342.79 116286.23 Actual Expenditure (Capital Section) 38.98 25.37 18.52 13.65 21.80 Total Actual Expenditure (Revenue and capital) 48958.63 55945.68 58107.41 102356.44 116308.03 (Source: Appropriation Accounts) Graphical Representation of Total Budget Estimates and Actual Expenditure During Last Five Years ( in Crores) 55452.49 62445.25 79455.04 138564.09 142970.
